LanguageData.AbandonedSadness_Sayers.stages.0.label: abandoned sorrow
LanguageData.AbandonedSadness_Sayers.stages.0.descrip: The cub looked up in confusion, calling in a strange place, but the response was only loss.
LanguageData.AlwaysNegative_Sayers.stages.0.label: not same race
LanguageData.AlwaysPositive_Sayers.stages.0.label: same race
LanguageData.Lonely_Sayers.stages.0.label: no-clan loneiness
LanguageData.Lonely_Sayers.stages.0.description: The cub looked around, trying to find a harmless figure similar to it, but found nothing.
